charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] entered the forest,
feeling as if something was drawing [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] in.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1101_0200_2:
Proceeding farther, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found Phoebe 
alone in a clearing looking around.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0402_0800_1: Huh? Wait, can’t you see her?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1200_1: Wait, can you not see Dusclops?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1300_1:
Well, let’s find out! Try to figure out where
Dusclops is!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1800_1: Come on out, Dusclops! Say hi!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_1900_1:
Well, now that [Name:PlayerNickname ]
is here, let’s put the game on hold.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2000_1:
Dusclops was on a roll,
so I guess I lose this time.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2100_1:
Oh, but we should count how many she actually
found! I might still have a chance!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2600_1: Wait a minute. Do you not...?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2700_1:
Ahaha! I get it now! You thought I was playing
hide-and-seek with Dusclops!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2800_1: No, we’re both always “it.” We do the seeking!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_2900_1:
The ones hiding are the spirits 
wandering around the forest!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0401_3100_1:
Dusclops absorbs wandering spirits
into her empty body.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_0402_3300_1:
Dusclops absorbs wandering spirits into her
empty body.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3400_1:
...I don’t know what happens to them when she
absorbs them, though...
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3500_1: OK, let’s see. Dusclops found one...two...three...
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3700_1:
I guess you really can’t see them,
can you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3800_1: You’re depending on your eyes too much.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_3900_1: Try to see with your heart. Feel them there.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4000_1:
If you do that, you’ll be able to see things that
you weren’t able to before.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4100_1:
For example, I can’t see the sync strength that
Dusclops and I share.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4200_1: But if I close my eyes like this, I can feel it.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4300_1: Just don’t think about it too hard!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4400_1:
Even if it’s something you can’t logically
understand, you can have an emotional
connection with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4500_1:
I’m sure you can feel that sync strength 
with your Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2301_1201_4600_1:
If you can do that, maybe you’ll be able to see
the spirits, also!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0100_1:
Our battles are going to get even tougher, and
we have to get stronger if we want to be able
to stand a chance.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0200_1: Acerola’s still young, so we gotta have her back.
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0300_1:
Exactly. But you’re still young yourself.
Are you sure you’re experienced enough to be
looking after others?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_1201_0400_1:
You bet! You wanna try me?
*giggle*
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0101_0100_1:
You sure know how to talk a big game, child.
Can you back that up?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0101_0200_1:
Ahahaha! See for yourself!
Come on, Dusclops! Let’s show her what we’re
made of!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0100_1:
Ho ho! It looks like you have the skill to back up
your boastful words!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0200_1:
You know it! But I think I got even better thanks to
battling you!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0300_1: Keep this up in the PML matches, too, Phoebe!
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0400_1:
Wha... Dusclops?!
Are you about to evolve?
charaepi_ch0049_00_fuyo/2311_0501_0500_1:
Ahahaha! I can’t wait to battle with you in your
new evolved form!
